message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at $120. I think you'll find it's a great deal!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down to $110, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
